about_the_game:
Maestro Level Editor allows you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels for Maestro VR and upcoming games in the Maestro saga by Symphonic Games.

  • Create Your Virtual Symphony Orchestra: Edit each instrument track by track, assigning them audio files that will be placed in the 3D space corresponding to each musician. Mix your orchestra's audio to experience a unique musical journey. Each concert hall has its own reverberation, adding realism and depth to your performances.

  • Synchronize Animations with Your Music: Watch your virtual orchestra perform your compositions in real time, synchronizing the musicians' animations with your audio tracks.

  • Create Levels for Maestro VR and the Maestro Saga: Craft personalized levels for Maestro VR and future games in the Maestro saga. With an intuitive interface, drag and drop icons onto the lanes to design your own symphonic rhythm game.

  • Share and Enjoy with Other Players: Immerse yourself in a unique experience that combines musical creativity with the entertainment of video games. Share your concerts and levels with the community and discover creations from other players.

  • Ideal for Composers and Musicians: With Maestro Level Editor, you can simulate a concert of your musical piece, creating a personalized symphony orchestra. It's an excellent tool for composers and musicians who wish to see and hear their works performed by a virtual orchestra.

Start creating, playing, and sharing with Maestro Level Editor and take your passion for music to the next level!
detailed_description:
Maestro Level Editor allows you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels for Maestro VR and upcoming games in the Maestro saga by Symphonic Games.

  • Create Your Virtual Symphony Orchestra: Edit each instrument track by track, assigning them audio files that will be placed in the 3D space corresponding to each musician. Mix your orchestra's audio to experience a unique musical journey. Each concert hall has its own reverberation, adding realism and depth to your performances.

  • Synchronize Animations with Your Music: Watch your virtual orchestra perform your compositions in real time, synchronizing the musicians' animations with your audio tracks.

  • Create Levels for Maestro VR and the Maestro Saga: Craft personalized levels for Maestro VR and future games in the Maestro saga. With an intuitive interface, drag and drop icons onto the lanes to design your own symphonic rhythm game.

  • Share and Enjoy with Other Players: Immerse yourself in a unique experience that combines musical creativity with the entertainment of video games. Share your concerts and levels with the community and discover creations from other players.

  • Ideal for Composers and Musicians: With Maestro Level Editor, you can simulate a concert of your musical piece, creating a personalized symphony orchestra. It's an excellent tool for composers and musicians who wish to see and hear their works performed by a virtual orchestra.

Start creating, playing, and sharing with Maestro Level Editor and take your passion for music to the next level!
name: Maestro Level Editor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380 or equivalent with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or equivalent with 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system for optimal performance

short_description: Maestro Level Editor allows you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels for Maestro VR and upcoming games in the Maestro saga by Symphonic Games. Create, play, share, and take your passion for music to the next level!
